16 class UResponse {
17  public static $headers = [ ];
18 
27  public static function header($headerField, $value, bool $replace = true, int $responseCode = null) {
28  self::$headers [trim ( $headerField )] = trim ( $value );
29  Startup::getHttpInstance ()->header ( trim ( $headerField ), trim ( $value ), $replace, $responseCode );
30  }
31 
37  private static function _headerArray($headerField, $values) {
38  if (\is_array ( $values )) {
39  $values = \implode ( ", ", $values );
40  }
41  self::header ( $headerField, $values );
42  }
43 
50  public static function setContentType($contentType, $encoding = null) {
51  $value = $contentType;
52  if (isset ( $encoding ))
53  $value .= '; charset=' . $encoding;
54  self::header ( 'Content-Type', $value );
55  }
56 
60  public static function noCache() {
61  self::header ( 'Cache-Control', 'no-cache, must-revalidate' );
62  self::header ( 'Expires', 'Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT' );
63  }
64 
72  public static function isSent(&$file = null, &$line = null) {
73  return Startup::getHttpInstance ()->headersSent ( $file, $line );
74  }
75 
79  public static function asJSON() {
80  self::header ( 'Content-Type', 'application/json' );
81  }
82 
89  public static function isJSON() {
90  return isset ( self::$headers ["Content-Type"] ) && self::$headers ["Content-Type"] === 'application/json';
91  }
92 
98  public static function asHtml($encoding = 'utf-8') {
99  self::setContentType ( 'text/html', $encoding );
100  }
101 
107  public static function asXml($encoding = 'utf-8') {
108  self::setContentType ( 'application/xml', $encoding );
109  }
110 
116  public static function asText($encoding = 'utf-8') {
117  self::setContentType ( 'plain/text', $encoding );

126  public static function setAccept($value) {
127  self::header ( 'Accept', $value );
128  }
129 
138  public static function enableCors($origin = '*', $methods = 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS', $headers = 'X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, Origin, Authorization') {
139  self::setAccessControlOrigin ( $origin );
140  self::setAccessControlMethods ( $methods );
141  self::setAccessControlHeaders ( $headers );
142  }
143 
150  public static function setAccessControlOrigin($origin = '*') {
151  self::header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin', $origin );
152  if ($origin !== '*') {
153  self::header ( 'Vary', 'Origin' );
154  }
155  }
156 
162  public static function setAccessControlMethods($methods) {
163  self::_headerArray ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods', $methods );
164  }
165 
171  public static function setAccessControlHeaders($headers) {
172  self::_headerArray ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers', $headers );
173  }
174 
180  public static function setAuthorization($authorization) {
181  self::header ( 'Authorization', $authorization );
182  }
183 
189  public static function setResponseCode($value) {
190  \http_response_code ( $value );
191  }
192 
198  public static function getResponseCode() {
199  return \http_response_code ();
200  }
201 }
